attributes.action: Block the introduction of pay parking for motorcycles in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Don't you already get enough money out of road users - this is just ridiculous. People have switched to motorcycles to avoid the congestion charge - now you want to make money from them too!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
